alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 02 at 3:10PM MDT until April 04 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM MONDAY TO 9 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 80 mph. * WHERE...Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Feet County. * WHEN...From 6 PM Monday to 9 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft
